entry.title: The narcotic known as ‘open source’
entry.summary: “Open-source: A stimulant of the central nervous system, tolerance reuptake inhibitor, reliance suppressant and cargo-cult inhibitor. Because of the way it strongly affects the left-brain pathways responsible for the feelings of independence, autonomy, self-determination and confidence, open-source can be highly addictive. Also referred with the street name ‘realization fix’, its …
entry.content: “Open-source: A stimulant of the central nervous system, tolerance reuptake inhibitor, reliance suppressant and cargo-cult inhibitor. Because of the way it strongly affects the left-brain pathways responsible for the feelings of independence, autonomy, self-determination and confidence, open-source can be highly addictive. Also referred with the street name ‘realization fix’, its long-term use can cause culture-shocks that other models still exist.”

entry.title: Git, oh git.
entry.summary:
Quotes (read: rants) seen today on IRC on git’s bad user interface:

There’s a clear distinction between git ‘the content-based distributed filesystem’ (which might as well be the greatest thing since sliced bread) and git ‘the user interface for the backend’ (which might as well be the most …
entry.content:
Quotes (read: rants) seen today on IRC on git’s bad user interface:

There’s a clear distinction between git ‘the content-based distributed filesystem’ (which might as well be the greatest thing since sliced bread) and git ‘the user interface for the backend’ (which might as well be the most chaotic thing after Big Bang).

Whenever I try to use git, I feel major PEBKAC waves taking place.

Like they say: A doctor can usually ‘bury’ his bad design. An architect can only suggest planting a thick ivy.


(cc) by chidorian

entry.title: Περί θερμίδων ερωτήσεις
entry.content: Σήμερα στο www.thermides.net, στις “τυχαίες αναζητήσεις”: Πανάνες Κοφλεξ Συροπιαστα Πασατεμπος Ξυλάγγουρο Γιερμαδες Μιλσεηκ Σεξ Μάφιν Βαζανια Φακητες Μπακλαβαδακι Πυραυλος Βοδιν Ψωμιά Κοκάκι Πιτογυρο Ραηςκρίσπις Βρώμικο Πετσα Κινέζικο

entry.title: Rubik’s cube
entry.content: A friend just gave me a Rubik’s cube. Great. Just what I needed right now, an exciting puzzle to solve with endless possibilities for improvement.

entry.title: More power, more power!
entry.summary:
It seems that Indiplex was trying to pull more power from the network than what it could provide us. Luckily the electricity guys came right after we dropped them a call and quickly put things back in place.

I asked the guy whether we burned out the cables from too …
entry.content:
It seems that Indiplex was trying to pull more power from the network than what it could provide us. Luckily the electricity guys came right after we dropped them a call and quickly put things back in place.

I asked the guy whether we burned out the cables from too much hacking. Without even smirking, he said it was probably the wind.

entry.title: Νέο slogan της Microsoft Hellas;
entry.content:
As seen at the Athens Microsoft Innovation Center
(Απαθανατίστηκε από τον nsyll)

Αναρωτιέμαι ποιανού διεστραμμένου μυαλού ήταν αυτή η ιδέα…

English translation: Original slogan: “Your potential. Our passion.”, hacked one: “Our potential. Your mistake.” (rhymes with passion in Greek).

entry.title: Μπουκιά και συγχώριο
entry.content: Όσο φανταστική κι αν είναι αυτή η πίτα λεμονιού (Ελευθερουδάκης, Πανεπιστημίου), είναι λίγο δύσκολο να χωνέψεις ότι η κάθε μπουκιά της κάνει μισό ευρώ. =)

entry.title: Twitter-mania
entry.content: Ωραία τα είπε ο Γιάννης. Μου θυμίζει με το greek blogosphere boom που το κάθε τι γινόταν θέμα. Τις μάχες των followers. Τσκ τσκ. :-)

entry.title: import –help
entry.content: Of course import --help takes a screenshot and saves it to a file named --help, what did you expect?

entry.title: 70s mood
entry.content:
As seen on #ellak on Freenode:

markos_
Προς το παρόν πίνω τον πόνο μου με καφέ και led zeppelin προσπαθώντας να γράψω σε αυτή την κωλογλώσσα που λέγεται Java.
Ναι, είμαι σε 60s-70s mood..
Δυστυχώς δεν κάνω drugs –ούτε πλέον έχω μακρύ μαλλί– για να δέσει το σύνολο.
